other_tests.findings: Histologically, the tumor had a diffuse growth pattern of polygonal cells with abundant clear cytoplasm, strongly positive for periodic acidâ€“Schiff and sensitive to diastase. No significant mitotic activity was seen.

other_tests.procedure_name: Left muscle-sparing thoracotomy and left upper lobectomy
other_tests.findings: A 4-cm firm mass in the left upper lobe extending toward the hilum was found.
